data.title: Lasker prize 2008 to Victor Ambros and Gary Ruvkun
data.meta_description:
Albert Lasker Basic Medical Research Award 2008 
Victor Ambros, David Baulcombe, and Gary Ruvkun 
For discoveries that revealed an unanticipated world of tiny RNAs that regulate gene function in plants and animals. 
http…
data.meta_site_name: Alliance of Genome Resources Community Forum
data.text:
Albert Lasker Basic Medical Research Award 2008

Victor Ambros, David Baulcombe, and Gary Ruvkun

For discoveries that revealed an unanticipated world of tiny RNAs that regulate gene function in plants and animals.

http://www.laskerfoundation.org/awards/2008basic.htm

Congratulations!!
